quote: I could have run after him. I could have asked politely for some clarification. But I didn’t I knew what I preferred, and that was—I didn’t want to know. Rather, I wanted to believe.
quote_letters: I COULD HAVE RUN AFTER HIM I COULD HAVE ASKED POLITELY FOR SOME CLARIFICATION BUT I DIDNT I KNEW WHAT I PREFERRED AND THAT WAS-I DIDNT WANT TO KNOW RATHER I WANTED TO BELIEVE
